dict.string: Advertising
Bluetooth Sharing
Apps that have requested the ability to share data via Bluetooth will appear here. These apps can share data even when youâ€™re not using them.
Calendars
Applications that have requested access to your calendars will appear here.
Camera
Apps that have requested access to the camera will appear here.
Contacts
Applications that have requested access to your contacts will appear here.
Facebook
Applications that have requested access to your Facebook account will appear here.
Location
Location Services
Location Services
Microphone
Applications that have requested access to the Microphone will appear here.
Photos
Apps that have requested access to your photos will appear here.
Photos stored on your iPad may contain other information, such as when and where the photo was taken.
Photos stored on your iPhone may contain other information, such as when and where the photo was taken.
Photos stored on your iPod touch may contain other information, such as when and where the photo was taken.
Privacy
As applications request access to your data, they will be added in the categories above.
Reminders
Applications that have requested access to your reminders will appear here.
Sina Weibo
Applications that have requested access to your Sina Weibo account will appear here.
As applications request access to your social accounts data, they will be added in the categories above.
Tencent Weibo
Applications that have requested access to your Tencent Weibo account will appear here.
Twitter
Applications that have requested access to your Twitter account will appear here.
